internalTypeName.description: The internal name of the type the attribute belongs to.

internalName.description: The internal name of the attribute, which is used in the database. Internal names usually contain only lowercase and uppercase letters and dots. They are similar to java package names.

localizedName.description: The localized name of the attribute, which is used in the user interface.

shortHelp.description: Short help text for the attribute, which explains the meaning of the attribute in a few words and is shown in the UI.

multiplicity.description: Specifies the multiplicity/cardinality of the attribute.
